DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine modify protocol constraint-induced movement therapy ( CIT ) effective rehabilitation treatment arm paresis child cerebral palsy . In child one main problem non-use affect arm . Many study show non-use phenomenon reverse CIT , rehabilitation program consist 15 day restrain unaffected arm plus daily intensive ( 6 hours/day ) physiotherapy train paretic arm . The present study aim evaluate shorten CIT protocol ( restrain device plus 2 weekly hour physiotherapy ) effective improving use function child paretic arm
DOC.brief_title: A Modified Constraint-Induced Movement Therapy Program Rehabilitation Arm Paresis Children With Cerebral Palsy
